product_name: Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Underwear T-Shirt - Women's
long_description: Offering very light warmth against the skin during activity in cool weather, the Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Underwear T-Shirt for women is perfect when midweight base layers are too warm. Stretchy, quick-drying and moisture-wicking polyester and spandex fabric offers very light insulation against skin. Odor-resistant fabric treatment helps deter odors. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Offset seams enhance mobility without chafing. The women's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Underwear T-Shirt offers a slim fit.
short_description: Offering very light warmth against the skin during activity in cool weather, the Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Underwear T-Shirt for women is perfect when midweight base layers are too warm.
